channel.title: Photography on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Mark Bialek, Ann Arbor Nights photographer
item.description: I'm hanging out at Roos Roast with photojournalist Mark Bialek, who is doing a photo shoot for them. Mark is known for his night time photos of Ann Arbor on his Ann Arbor Nights weblog. We're talking about working together in some way to have some of his photos show up here on this weblog. As a start, here's one of his favorites: a night time winter scene from Kerrytown.

item.title: Yahoo makes changes to Flickr, users are not happy
item.description: The site loads slowly, the photos are all squished together, and the carefully curated metadata and tags and comments and photo names are de-emphasized. It's like a weird mix of Pinterest and Tumblr. I'm hoping for a classic.flickr.com to preserve the old UI, in the same way that old-school Weather Underground users can use classic.wunderground.com to see things the way they were meant to be. If I had the time, I'd cherry pick the best photos from my Flickr stream and blog about them here.
